title: Christmas Homecoming (Davis Landing, Book 6)
description: The Gossip Guru…hears wealthy newspaper tycoon Wallace Hamilton may finally be released from the hospital, after recurring visits following his bone-marrow transplant.But the juiciest Hamilton news is that Jeremy—who is not Wallace's son—has been in contact with his family again… and he might rejoin Hamilton Media. A certain lovely single mom has been spotted doing holiday volunteer work with the former business tycoon. Perhaps the charms and strong spiritual life of Gabi Valencia helped create this Christmas homecoming for Jeremy.
author: Lenora Worth
